sentences.en: Exercise is a good safety valve for the tension that builds up at work.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体是排解工作压力的好办法。

sentences.en: Residents heard an enormous bang as a safety valve on the boiler failed.
sentences.cn: 由于锅炉的安全阀失效，居民们听到了砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: Some carburetors have an auxliary fuel valve and inlet.
sentences.cn: 有些化油器具有备用的燃油阀和入口.

sentences.en: The abnormality mitral stenosis was in myocardium, not in the valve.
sentences.cn: 二尖瓣狭窄的病变是在心肌而不是在瓣膜.

sentences.en: The analyser or sensing unit contains the sample - injection valve.
sentences.cn: 分析和传感单元内有注样阀.

sentences.en: The bag is resealed with a simple twist of the valve.
sentences.cn: 只需拧一下阀门，气囊就能重新密封。

sentences.en: The connecting rod may drive a valve stem directly.
sentences.cn: 连杆可以直接带动阀门的把柄.

sentences.en: The exhaust valve on my car has burnt out three times.
sentences.cn: 我车子上的排气阀已烧坏三次.

sentences.en: The exhaust valve on my car has burnt out.
sentences.cn: 我汽车上的排气阀烧掉了.

sentences.en: The feed - pipe is as clean as a whistle, so I'm afraid, if the oil is not getting through to the burner, the valve must be faulty.
sentences.cn: 送料管干干净净, 所以我担心要是油不通过喷嘴, 阀门一定有毛病.

sentences.en: The ileocecal valve and terminal ileum are usually dilated rather than stenosed.
sentences.cn: 回盲部和末端回肠常呈扩张面而不狭窄.

sentences.en: The intake valve was jammed open.
The PCV valve sticks in the open, maximum - flow position.
sentences.cn: 把PCV阀固定在开启位置即最大流量位置.

sentences.en: The pump sucks air out ( of the vessel ) through this valve.
sentences.cn: 这台泵通过这个阀门把 ( 容器中的 ) 空气抽出.

phrases.tran_cn: 施压阀；压力控制阀，压力増压阀
阀门控制，阀控制器；调节阀，气门控制

trans.tran_cn: 阀，真空管，（管乐器的）活栓，（心脏的）瓣膜
trans.tran_en: a part of a tube or pipe that opens and shuts like a door to control the flow of liquid, gas, air etc passing through it
